column745:
There are  many assumptions about 'climate' change/global weather change.
 Where is the funding coming from for the scientists who say there is change?
 The Earth's climate has been changing for billions of years and will continue to do so.
 The one subject no politician ever talks about is population growth - the more people we have living on this rock the more pollution/food/energy is required.
 Every country wants their economies to grow year on year - how does this fit with limiting the use of fossil fuels? 
 Whoever this survey was written for, how do they respond to the Germans dismantling windmills to dig up brown coal to replace the Russian gas to keep the BMW/Audi plants churning away?
 How do they also respond to the child slavery and pollution in mining lithium?
 The wind does not always blow and the sun does not always shine.  How is the energy gap to be filled?  Import more wood chippings from Canada?
